title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Language Proficiency Improvement Course Through Mobile-Based Group Learning Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute group assignments using mobile collaboration tools
Learners can improve their language project outcomes by incorporating peer feedback
Learners can apply at least six of the eight components of the GLAID framework to practical activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
